Verses: 1 padhinaalu Varusham Sendrapinbu, Naan Theeththuvaik Koottikkondu Parnabaavudanekooda Marupadiyum Erusalemukkup Ponen.

2 naan Theva Arivippinaale Poi, Purajaadhigalidaththil Naan Pirasangikkira Suviseshaththai Avargalukku Vivariththuk Kaanbiththen; Aayinum Naan Odugiradhum, Odinadhum Veenaagaadhapadikku Ennikkaiyullavargalukke Thanimaiyaai Vivariththuk Kaanbiththen.
3 aanaalum Ennudanekooda Irundha Theeththu Girekkanaayirundhum Viruththasedhanampannikkollumpadikkuk Kattaayampannappadavillai.

4 kiristhu Yesuvukkul Namakku Undaana Suyaadheenaththai Ulavupaarththu Nammai Niyaayappiramaaranaththirku Adimaigalaakkumporuttaagap Pakkavazhiyaai Nuzhaindha Kalla Sagodharar Nimiththam Appadiyaayitru.
5 suviseshaththin Saththiyam Ungalidaththile Nilaiththirukkumpadi, Naangal Oru Naazhigaiyaagilum Avargalukkuk Keezhppadindhu Inangavillai.

6 allaamalum Ennikkaiyullavargalaayirundhavargal Enakku Ondrum Bodhikkavillai; Avargal Eppadippattavargalaayirundhaalum Enakkuk Kavalaiyillai (akkaraiyillai), Dhevan Manusharidaththil Patchapaadhamullavarallave.
7 adhuvumallaamal, Viruththasedhanamullavargalukku Apposthalanaayirukkumpadi Pedhuruvaip Balappaduththinavar Purajaadhigalukku Apposthalanaayirukkumpadi Ennaiyum Balappaduththinapadiyaal,

8 viruththasedhanamulla Avargalukku Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikkumpadi Pedhuruvukkuk Kaiyalikkappattadhupola, Viruththasedhanam Illaadhavargalukkup Pirasangikkumpadi Adhu Enakkum Kaiyalikkappattadhendru Avargal Kandu;

9 enakku Alikkappatta Kirubaiyai Arindhabodhu, Thoongalaaga Ennappatta Yaakkobum, Kebaavum, Yovaanum, Thaangal Viruththasedhanamullavargalukkum, Naangal Purajaadhigalukkum Pirasangikkumpadi, Anniyonniya Aikkiyaththirku Adaiyaalamaaga Enakkum Parnabaavukkum Valadhukai Koduththu,
10 thariththirarai Ninaiththukkollumpadikkumaaththiram Sonnaargal; Appadich Cheyyumpadi Adharku Munname Naanum Karuththullavanaayirundhen.
11 melum, Pedhuru Andhiyogiyaavukku Vandhabodhu, Avanmel Kutranjsumandhadhinaal, Naan Mugamugamaai Avanode Edhirththen.
12 eppadiyenil, Yaakkobinidaththilirundhu Silar Varugiradharkumunne Avan Purajaadhiyaarudane Saappittaan; Avargal Vandhabodho, Viruththasedhanamullavargalukkup Bayandhu, Vilagip Pirindhaan.
13 matra Yoodharum Avanudanekooda Maayampanninaargal; Avargaludaiya Maayaththinaale Parnabaavum Izhuppundaan.

14 ippadi Avargal Suviseshaththin Saththiyaththirketrapadi Sariyaai Nadavaadhadhai Naan Kandabodhu, Ellaarukkum Munbaaga Naan Pedhuruvai Nokkichsonnadhu Ennavendraal: Yoodhanaayirukkira Neer Yoodhar Muraimaiyaaga Nadavaamal, Purajaadhiyaar Muraimaiyaaga Nadandhukondirukka, Purajaadhiyaarai Yoodharmuraimaiyaaga Nadakkumpadi Neer Eppadikkattaayam Pannalaam?

15 purajaadhiyaaril Pirandha Paavigalaayiraamal, Subaavaththinpadi Yoodharaayirukkira Naamum Yesukiristhuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaaleyandri, Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalinaale Manushan Needhimaanaakkappaduvadhillaiyendru Arindhu, Niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalinaalalla,kiristhuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaale Needhimaangalaakkappadumpadikkuk Kiristhu Yesuvinmel Visuvaasigalaanom.
16 niyaayappiramaanaththin Kiriyaigalinaale Endha Manushanum Needhimaanaakkappaduvadhillaiye.
17 kiristhuvukkul Needhimaankalaakkappadumpadi Naadugira Naamum Paavigalaagak Kaanappaduvomaanaal, Kiristhu Paavaththirkuk Kaaranaro? Allave.
18 naan Idiththuppottavaigalaiye Naan Marupadiyum Kattinaal, Piramaanaththai Meerugiravanendru Kaanappaduven.
19 dhevanukkendru Pizhaikkumpadi Naan Niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Niyaayappiramaanaththirku Mariththene.

20 kiristhuvudanekoodach Chiluvaiyilaraiyappatten; Aayinum, Pizhaiththirukkiren; Ini Naan Alla, Kiristhuve Enakkul Pizhaiththirukkiraar; Naan Ippozhudhu Maamsaththil Pizhaiththirukkiradho, Ennil Anbukoorndhu Enakkaagath Thammaiththaame Oppukkoduththa Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaale Pizhaiththirukkiren.
21 naan Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyai Virudhaavaakkugiradhillai; Needhiyaanadhu Niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Varumaanaal, Kiristhu Mariththadhu Veenaayirukkume.
